results.title: U.S. Territories Investor Protection Act of 2017
results.short_title: U.S. Territories Investor Protection Act of 2017
results.committees: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs Committee
results.latest_major_action: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 14.
results.summary: U.S. Territories Investor Protection Act of 2017  This bill amends the Investment Company Act of 1940 to apply the Act to investment companies created under the laws of Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, or any other U.S. possession.
results.summary_short: U.S. Territories Investor Protection Act of 2017  This bill amends the Investment Company Act of 1940 to apply the Act to investment companies created under the laws of Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, or any other U.S. possession.

actions.description: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 14.
Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Reported by Senator Crapo with amendments. Without written report.
Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
